purpose: The email announces a Postdoctoral Researcher position at the Technical University of Denmark in the field of Software Architecture and Software Evaluation or Digital Twin & Digital Transformation. It invites applied researchers with a passion for practical European projects to apply, emphasizing the relevance of experience in domains such as Energy, Mobility, or Climate Change. The email encourages recipients to circulate the job posting within their research teams or professional networks.

evidence_sentences: There is a Postdoctoral Researcher at the Dynamical Systems section at DTU Compute.

If you're an applied researcher with a passion for practical European projects, this is your opportunity to elevate your work in Software Engineering and contribute to impactful research with real-world relevance.
Experience or interest in domains such as Energy, Mobility, or Climate Change is highly relevant.
Please find the full job posting and application details below.
It would be greatly appreciated if you could circulate this position among your research team or through your professional network.
